original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 16.13. Kusalattika, Āsavagocchaka
analyzed: kusalattika āsavagocchaka

original: Akusalaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naāsavo dhammo …pe… nakusalo naāsavo dhammo
analyzed: akusalam āsavam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na āsavaḥ dhammo pe na kusalaḥ na āsavaḥ dhammo

original: …pe… naabyākato naāsavo dhammo …pe… nakusalo naāsavo ca naabyākato naāsavo ca dhammā
analyzed: pe na abyākataḥ na āsavaḥ dhammo pe na kusalaḥ na āsavo ca na abyākataḥ na āsavo ca dhammā

original: …pe… nakusalo naāsavo ca naakusalo naāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Hetuyā
analyzed: pe na kusalaḥ na āsavaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na āsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā hetuyā

original: pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: pañca ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate pañca

original: Akusalaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: akusalam noāsavam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na noāsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Akusalaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nanoāsavo dhammo …pe… nakusalo nanoāsavo
analyzed: akusalam noāsavam dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ nanoāsavaḥ dhammaḥ pe na kusalaḥ nanoāsavaḥ

original: ca naabyākato nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ca na abyākataḥ na noāsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Abyākataṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Lokiyadukasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākatam sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca pe

original: Akusalaṁ āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naāsavasampayutto dhammo …pe…
analyzed: akusalam āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na āsava sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ pe

original: nakusalo naāsavasampayutto dhammo …pe… naabyākato naāsavasampayutto dhammo …pe… nakusalo
analyzed: na kusalaḥ na āsava sampayutto dhammo pe na abyākataḥ na āsava sampayutto dhammo pe na kusalo

original: naāsavasampayutto ca naabyākato naāsavasampayutto ca dhammā …pe… nakusalo naāsavasampayutto
analyzed: na āsava sampayutto ca na abyākato na āsava sampayutto ca dhammā pe na kusalo na āsava sampayutto

original: ca naakusalo naāsavasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe
analyzed: ca na akusalaḥ na āsava sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe

original: tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: tīṇi pe avigate pañca

original: Akusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naāsavavippayutto dhammo …pe…
analyzed: akusalam āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na āsava vippayuttaḥ dhammo pe

original: naabyākato naāsavavippayutto dhammo …pe… nakusalo naāsavavippayutto ca naabyākato
analyzed: na abyākataḥ na āsava vippayutto dhammo pe na kusalaḥ na āsava vippayutto ca na abyākataḥ

original: naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Akusalaṁ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca
analyzed: akusalam āsavam ca iva sa āsavam ca dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca

original: dhammo …pe… nakusalo naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo …pe… naabyākato naāsavo ceva
analyzed: dhammo pe na kusalaḥ na āsavo ca iva na anāsavo ca dhammo pe na abyākataḥ na āsavo ca iva

original: naanāsavo ca dhammo …pe… nakusalo naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naabyākato naāsavo ceva
analyzed: na anāsavaḥ ca dhammo pe na kusalaḥ na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca na abyākataḥ na āsavaḥ ca iva

original: naanāsavo ca dhammā …pe… nakusalo naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naakusalo naāsavo ceva
analyzed: na anāsavo ca dhammā pe na kusalaḥ na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na āsavaḥ ca iva

original: naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na anāsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate pañca

original: Akusalaṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naanāsavo ceva nano ca
analyzed: akusalam sa āsavam ca iva no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na anāsavaḥ ca iva na no ca

original: āsavo dhammo …pe… naabyākato naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo …pe… nakusalo naanāsavo
analyzed: āsavo dhammo pe na abyākataḥ na anāsavo ca iva na no ca āsavo dhammo pe na kusalaḥ na anāsavo

original: ceva nano ca āsavo naabyākato naanāsavo ceva nano āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca iva na no ca āsavaḥ na abyākataḥ na anāsavaḥ ca iva na no āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Akusalaṁ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto
analyzed: akusalam āsavam ca iva āsava sampayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na āsavaḥ ca iva na āsava vippayuttaḥ

original: ca dhammo …pe… naabyākato naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo …pe… nakusalo
analyzed: ca dhammo pe na abyākataḥ na āsavo ca iva na āsava vippayutto ca dhammo pe na kusalo

original: naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca naabyākato naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā
analyzed: na āsavaḥ ceva na āsava vippayutto ca na abyākataḥ na āsavaḥ ceva na āsava vippayutto ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayāḥ hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Akusalaṁ āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naāsavavippayutto
analyzed: akusalam āsava sampayuttam ca iva no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na āsava vippayuttaḥ

original: ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo …pe… naabyākato naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo
analyzed: ca iva na no ca āsavo dhammo pe na abyākataḥ na āsava vippayutto ca iva na no ca āsavo dhammo

original: …pe… nakusalo naāsavavippayutto ceva nanoāsavo ca naabyākato naāsavavippayutto ceva
analyzed: na kusalo na āsava vippayutto ceva na no āsavo ca na abyākataḥ na āsava vippayutto ceva

original: nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na no ca āsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Abyākataṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Lokiyadukasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākatam āsava vippayuttam sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca pe
